text: iru katalkalum camamaki vitatu; onru kutippatarku inpamana maturamana tannir! Marronru kotiya uppu(t tannir. Ivvaru ivvirantirkum verrumai iruntapotilum), ivvirantil iruntume puttam putiya (min) mamicattaip pucikkirirkal. Ninkal aparanamaka aniyakkutiya (muttu, pavalam ponra)varraiyum avarriliruntu veliye etukkirirkal. Katalkalaip pilantu kontu cellum kappalil (payanam ceytu pala tecankalilulla) iraivanutaiya arulai ninkal tetik kolkirirkal. (Itarku) ninkal nanri celuttuvirkalaka
